$schema.description: JSON schema for this document, also used as a version indicator.

publicKey.description: Ed25519 public key associated with the private key used to compute the signature.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 (UTC based, no offset) timestamp of the signature date & time.

sourceURL.description: Permalink to the source code at the state it was when being signed.

buildURL.description: Permalink to the public CI/CD run where this signature occurred.

manifest.description: Each entry in the manifest represents an artifact file being published.

path.description: Relative file path (from the package root)

hash.description: BLAKE2b hash of the file contents (64 byte output, no key, default parameters, hex encoding)

sizeBytes.description: Size of the file in bytes

signature.description: Ed25519ph signature of the path, hash and size in bytes.
